security Education Gift cards Licensing Unlocked stories View Sitemap Search Search or ask a question No results Cancel Information for Investors New Investor If you want to know more about Microsoft, the following materials will help provide an introduction to our business. Fiscal Year 2025 Annual Report Download: Word (1.8MB) Fiscal Year 2025 Proxy Statement Download: Word (4MB) Earnings Release Download: Word (100 KB) Fiscal Year 2026 First Quarter Form 10Q Download: Word (1MB) Direct Purchase and Reinvestment Program Computershare, Microsoft&#39;s transfer agent, administers a direct stock purchase plan and a dividend reinvestment plan for the company. To find out more about these programs you may contact Computershare directly at (800) 285-7772, Option 1, between the hours of 8 A.M. and 8 P.M. Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, and Saturday 9 A.M. and 5 P.M. Eastern Time. Alternatively, you can view the program online by going to the Computershare website. Receive Report Materials Electronically Shareholders may opt for the convenience of electronic shareholder materials. Subscribers receive messages containing links to the online annual report and proxy statement, and may vote their proxies online. If you own stock through a broker, sign up on icsdelivery.com. If you own stock directly, sign up on Computershare IRS Forms Participants in the 2023 Microsoft Corporation Note Exchange – Form 8937 PDF (147KB) Report of Organization Actions Affecting Basis of Securities: Participants in the 2023 Microsoft Corporation Note Exchange – Section 1273 PDF (34KB) Publication of Issue Price: Participants in the 2021 Microsoft Corporation Note Exchange – Form 8937 PDF (309KB) Report of Organization Actions Affecting Basis of Securities: Participants in the 2021 Microsoft Note Exchange – Section 1273 PDF (85KB) Publication of Issue Price: Former GitHub Shareholders - Form 8937 PDF (140KB) Report of Organizational Actions Affecting Basis of Securities: Participants in the Microsoft Corporation Note Exchange - Form 8937 PDF (227KB) Report of Organizational Actions Affecting Basis of Securities: Participants in the Microsoft Note Exchange - Section 1273 PDF (88KB) Publication of Issue Price: Related Information View latest Earnings Release SEC Filings XBRL Board &amp;
